sn35.140:1.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppadaya, sopi anicco.
sn35.140:1.3: Aniccasambhutam, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto niccam bhavissati …pe…
sn35.140:1.5: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhaya uppadaya sopi anicco.
sn35.140:1.6: Aniccasambhuta, bhikkhave, jivha kuto nicca bhavissati …pe…
sn35.140:1.8: Yopi, bhikkhave, hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppadaya, sopi anicco.
sn35.140:1.9: Aniccasambhuto, bhikkhave, mano kuto nicco bhavissati.
sn35.140:1.10: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… jivhayapi nibbindati …pe… manasmimpi nibbindati,
sn35.140:1.11: nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.140:1.12: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
